title: Hoang Son Lai - Data Analyst

    This is my personal journey into the world of data analysis. Let's enjoy the journey together.

title: About Me
text:
As a young professional early in my career, I understand there’s still much to learn - and I’m fully committed to that journey. With a strong academic foundation in finance and current postgraduate study in Business Analytics at Monash University, I’m working hard every day to develop both my technical and professional skills. I’ve gained valuable hands-on experience in finance, insurance, and data analysis, and I’m eager to keep improving through real-world challenges. I may be at the beginning, but I bring energy, adaptability, and a serious willingness to grow into every opportunity.



Monash University | Melbourne, Australia | Master’s degree, Business Analytics | Mar 2025 - Dec 2026
Foreign Trade University | Hanoi, Viet Nam | Bachelor’s degree, Banking and International Finance | Sep 2020 - Aug 2024




BAOVIET INSURANCE | Hanoi, Viet Nam | Insurance Intern | Oct 2024 - Dec 2024
Shinhan Vietnam Finance Company | Hanoi, Viet Nam | Telesales Representative | May 2024 - Sep 2024
RSM Vietnam Company | Hanoi, Viet Nam | Audit Intern | Jul 2023 - Aug 2023

title: Welcome to My Data Journey
text:
This is the beginning of my blog where I will be sharing my journey into the world of data analysis. I’ll be documenting my learning process, projects I’m working on, and insights I gain along the way.
I’m excited to connect with others in the data community. Let’s learn and grow together!
